channel.title: Blog on Hanna
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Hanna

item.title: The Faroe Islands: a collection of stories and snapshots
item.description: [Tap photos to enlarge] Don’t look like a serial killer. Arm out. Thumb up. Higher… Like you know what you’re doing! Ass hole… don’t look at me like that. Nobody is going to stop if your thumb ain’t got enough confidence. That website definitely lied.
